blogPost.title: With 87% of companies reported, Q4 S&P 500 GAAP earnings were down 20% over the prior year. $SPX https://t.co/CyvUdWFwvZ
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 87%的公司发布了报告，第四季度S&P 500的GAAP收益比上年下降了20%。$SPX https://t.co/CyvUdWFwvZ
